code: export var get_opp_color=function get_opp_color(color){return color==='w'?'b':'w';};function SpotInOptions(spot,move_options){for(var index=0;index<move_options.length;index++){var element=move_options[index];if(element[0]===spot[0]&&element[1]===spot[1]){return true;}}return false;}export default SpotInOptions;
